# Tool Compatibility Matrix

> **Last verified:** 2025-12-20

| Tool | Reads AGENTS.md | Adapter Required | Adapter Location |
|------|-----------------|------------------|------------------|
| Claude Code | Via `@import` | Yes | `CLAUDE.md` |
| Gemini CLI | Via `@import` | Yes | `GEMINI.md` |
| Cursor | Native | Optional | `.cursor/rules/00-canonical.mdc` |
| Copilot Agent | Native | No | N/A |

See [AGENTS.md](../../AGENTS.md) for the actual instructions.

> *For the reasoning behind this architecture, see [ADR 0001: Portable Agent Instructions](../adr/0001-portable-agent-instructions.md).*
